venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's STeak House in Auburn on Thursday nights. Teams consist of about six people each. An emcee reads the questions, and each team then submits an answer, bidding a certain number of points each time. The team with the most points at the end wins.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a small meetup sign; plus, closer to the event I will give out my cell phone number
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's
